attributes.action: Improve water ways in the uk immediately
attributes.background:
The current government allows sewage to be released into our waterways and on many occasions allow waterways to be a safe swimming areas.
I want the government to change how this is done. The government needs to save our water ways

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition which calls for a similar action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635193

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to introduce these new requirements now, but if you want to start a new petition you will need to provide your full name.
